root.name: The Cursed Crusade
root.description: OverviewThe Cursed Crusade takes place at the end of the 12th century and follows the story of two warriors who have been afflicted by the Templar's Curse. The Curse threatens to burn away their humanity and accelerate their descent into hell. They must fight to save their souls!
